chantelleayanna: Been feeling it too recently. We got this!!!
jlcan36: You are wonderful ..comparing yourself to others is just human nature but ever small accomplishment even the most simple mundane every day things are worth being proud of.when you are depressed even just taking a shower feels like a huge feat..go easy on yourself and celebrate the small victories 😘💓
mrs_shepp: Be kind to yourself and don’t be afraid to ask for help xx 💕
paigejoannaa: You’re so strong and things will get better darling! I know the darkness that comes with having long term health problems but you’ll get your spark back 💖🌟 xxxx
everydayjoyandme: O gosh this. All this. So much love to you x
justthefwordblog: Just had this exact convo with a friend. It's so natural to feel that way and frustrating af! You've killed it this year yet again. Cannot wait to see what the new year has instore for you. Soft hugs ♡
gomcp: I can so relate ☹️! It’s very easy to say “do not compare yourself to others & their achievements!”, but hard to not do. As someone dealing with this myself, I can honestly say there will be good & bad days. Do not give up 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽‼️
dianasaladpot: I had a meltdown last week and basically stayed home all week except for Tues. I just can’t right now - I’m sure the election isn’t helping but yeah chronic pain just makes me feel I’ve got a dead end life. There’s people would look at me like well you’re earning good money (which I am at the minute) or would look at you and go oh but she had a clothing collection this year. And yes it’s true. But it all feels tinged in shit like what more could I be doing if my body wasn’t a let down of pain all the time that anything nice is still covered in a smile that’s part grimace. It’s all just a big wet fart frankly.
jturnerlowe: I love this classic look!! You look fabulous and I hope you’re feeling better today! Please know that you’re on the right path!!
theweirdone_xx: Genuinely the skirt of DREAMS. I want to live in that skirt 😍 You look lush ❤️
galleryxxl: You look wonderful though. Stay strong. Hugs from Dubai 😘
amymoo94: Sending love and light to you ❤️❤️take care xxxxxxxxx❤️❤️
sam.howse: Everyone has some form of struggle in life even if a small or large one. Never feel alone we all have them. Your such a inspiration to all your followers , friends and family so be proud yourself not sad. Go have best Xmas away drink laugh be merry xx 🎄🎅🎉
leanda_dawn: I've been feeling anxious and extra depressed despite the antidepressant that I'm on. There's so much going on around me right now. I don't leave the house very often which is not healthy either. But I know there's a light at the end of the tunnel. I just keep going. Even getting out for a few hours makes a difference. I went to my nephews college recital last Thursday and this Thursday I have to go to the campus to take my final. So, hang in there. Stay home if you don't feel like it and get out when you can. Sending love and hugs from Tennessee!💛💙❤️💚💜
bethelizabethuk: You're doing amazing and look incredible 💜 totally get the comparing thing though. Forever doing it even though I know it makes me feel lile shit

sallysparkel: @daniellevanier oh bless u hun.... good friends can help pick u up❤️ hope u had a fun day today ❤️

curvy_roamer: This makes me sad. Sending so much love to you. ❤️
